bill.summary:
Susquehanna National Heritage Area Act
This bill establishes the Susquehanna National Heritage Area in Pennsylvania.
The Susquehanna Heritage Corporation is designated as the local coordinating entity for the area.
The Corporation shall prepare and submit a management plan for the area.
